group_1.textLeft: Kaede! Hurry up and get over here!
We only have an hour left before our meeting@starts!

group_1.textRight: Slow down, Rena...!

group_1.textLeft: Actually, I'm kind of hungry.

group_1.textCenter: I’ll just swing by the beach house first and grab@something, and then we can―

group_1.textRight: Bwah?!

group_1.textLeft: S-sorry about that...!

group_1.textRight: No, I'm the one who's sor―
Um, what?

group_1.textLeft: Wh...what are you doing here so early?!@Why are you in a swimsuit?!

group_1.textRight: No, why are YOU...?!

group_1.textLeft: Erm, we... we were just going to play on the@beach until it was time to meet...

group_1.textRight: Oh, really? I suppose we all had the same idea!

group_1.textLeft: Well, considering you guys are here,
How much do you wanna bet Yozuru's@somewhere around, too?

group_1.textRight: ...Oh, over there...!
Oh, everyone's here...!

group_1.textLeft: I didn't realize you'd already arrived... and in@your swimsuit, too.

group_1.textRight: My teacher instructed me to change into a@swimsuit as soon as I arrived at the beach.

group_1.textLeft: What exactly is your teacher trying to teach you...?

group_1.textRight: In any case, while we’re far ahead of schedule,@we’ve gathered here nevertheless.
Shall we determine whether this beach will be@suitable for our movie?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
(...On the one hand, having the five of us@together feels pretty awkward...)
(...On the other hand, splitting up and meeting@again afterwards sounds even worse.)
...Yeah, let's get started.
Even though we're in our swimsuits, we can@preview the shoot anyway.

group_1.textRight: I'd rather wear my swimsuit, anyway!
That way, falling into the ocean is nothing to be@concerned about!

group_1.textLeft: What kind of scenarios do you even have in@mind...?
...Well, whatever.
To recap, the basic gist of our movie is that it'll@be a beachside drama.
We'll use today to decide on the story and what@scenes we'll shoot.
Where do you guys want to start?

group_1.textRight: Why don't we visit various tourist sites on the@beach?
There are several places that seem promising,
Such as local lighthouses and famous restaurants.

group_1.textLeft: You seem really familiar with this place, Yozuru!

group_1.textRight: I did some research last night and took notes.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, same here. I saw this really great beach@cafe when I was looking up the area.
It has a really good atmosphere to it, like@something you'd see in a TV drama.
But the thing is, a drama needs thrills.
What better place for those than one of the@caves nearby, or the rocky shore?

group_1.textRight: Speaking of which, I’ve heard one of the shores@around here is associated with a mermaid legend.
We can check that out later.

group_1.textLeft: A legend?! That’s music to my ears!

group_1.textRight: Still, even though it's a tourist attraction,@it's quite difficult to access.
The scaffolding is poor, so it seems like it's easy@to slip and fall there.
We'll need to be careful not to injure ourselves.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks for the heads up.
Alright, which place should we look at first?

group_1.textRight: I'm interested in that place with the mermaid@legend!

group_1.textLeft: Same here!

group_1.textRight: Well... we'll check out the shoreline first, then!

group_1.textLeft: I'll go wherever the rest of you want to go.
But... I wanted to go to the beach house...

group_1.textRight: Majority rules. Even if that wasn't the case,@that’s where I’d be headed anyway.

group_1.textLeft: Excuse me? Who the hell do you think you are?!

group_1.textRight: You want to settle this some other way, then?@Perhaps through competition?

group_1.textLeft: You know what, fine! I can take you in any game,@anytime!

group_1.textRight: Rena, stop! You can’t!

group_1.textLeft: Why not?!

group_1.textRight: Because if we don't work together, we won't be@able to make this movie.
And if we can't make a movie, that means we're@not getting that stuffed animal for Momoko, right?

group_1.textLeft: Dammit...
...Fine. We’ll start with the rocks, then.
